io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.message.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersistentHarvestingDelegationMessage, RawMessage, TypedMessage

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract message class that serves as the base class of all message types.
